name: atlas-spanner-poc
description: Atlas schema management for Google Cloud Spanner PoC

scripts.inspect:sql: atlas schema inspect --env dev > schema/schema-generated.sql && echo 'Generated: schema/schema-generated.sql'
scripts.inspect:hcl: atlas schema inspect --env dev --format '{{ hcl . }}' > schema/schema-generated.hcl && echo 'Generated: schema/schema-generated.hcl'
scripts.sql:diff: echo 'ðŸ“ Using SQL schema...' && atlas schema diff --env dev --to file://schema/schema.sql
scripts.sql:apply: echo 'ðŸ“ Applying SQL schema...' && atlas schema apply --env dev --to file://schema/schema.sql --auto-approve
scripts.sql:apply:check: echo 'ðŸ“ Applying SQL schema...' && atlas schema apply --env dev --to file://schema/schema.sql
scripts.hcl:diff: echo 'ðŸ”· Using HCL schema...' && atlas schema diff --env dev-hcl --to file://schema/schema.hcl --config atlas-hcl.hcl
scripts.hcl:apply: echo 'ðŸ”· Applying HCL schema...' && atlas schema apply --env dev-hcl --to file://schema/schema.hcl --config atlas-hcl.hcl --auto-approve
scripts.hcl:apply:check: echo 'ðŸ”· Applying HCL schema...' && atlas schema apply --env dev-hcl --to file://schema/schema.hcl --config atlas-hcl.hcl
